nodes.text: The Thergum Pits were a location on the planet Essowyn. It was a source of contention between the nations of Tresycht and Yiszte. When Messert Mines Corporation struck a deal with Tresycht to begin mining operations in the Thergum Pits, they provided equipment and security forces to help Tresycht subjugate the nation of Yiszte.
